argument.name: Reporting_on
argument.description: Logical. .T. = Report errors as they occur in Xbasic scripts, .F. = Do not report errors as they occur in Xbasic scripts.

page.description: If there is no error handler, should xbasic errors be reported? default is TRUE.
page.discussion: ERROR_REPORTING() enables error reporting in Xbasic scripts as they occur. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
